short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize your design system built with Morfeo
short.it: Visualizza il tuo design system creato con Morfeo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Morfeo it's a tool to build design systems based on a theme. It helps you to follow a design language and write consistent UIs, whatever it is the framework of your choice. It's easy to use and, with the browser extension, your theme and your components are automatically documented.
